column4: what do you mean, it IS debians d-i? it's exactly the same no?
one would assume so, but i'm experiencing different results... keeps telling me that "no valid mirror was configured" when i get to installing the base system
did you make sure you set your ip manually? your dhcp server is not working and so it can't config a repository?
i suppose it could be timing out or something along those lines, although it's definitely working for the rest of the network
